attributes.action: lobby Cornwall Airport Limited to change the name of Newquay Cornwall Airport to 'Jethro International', in recognition of Cornwall's most well known entertainer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Airports in Liverpool, Belfast and elsewhere have been renamed to rightly pay respect to those cities' favourite sons. Jethro is Cornwall's most successful entertainer and deserves similar celebration. 

We call upon the Prime Minister to enter discussions with Cornwall Airport Limited in order to encourage them to change the name of Newquay Cornwall Airport to 'Jethro International'. Such a change is well deserved and would bring significant benefits to the Cornish tourist industry.

rejection.details: Please contact the airport directly with your suggestion.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
